snippet: Marcus Belgrave, a Motown veteran, honored his students and Lawrence Williams at the Jazz Standard.
abstract: Nate Chinen reviews performance by trumpeter Marcus Belgrave at Jazz Standard.
lead_paragraph: Marcus Belgrave, a Motown veteran, honored his students and Lawrence Williams at the Jazz Standard.
